name: Secret Flirts: Make Everyone Fall For You!
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

Become irresistible and win the heart of the boy of your dreams!

  • Create and develop your character:choose your looks, haircut, body shape, even your witty chat, and catch the eye of all the boys.
  • Go shopping, find a part-time job, go to college... manage your time and money so you can buy yourself clothes, make-up and accessories!
  • Have a blast with the mini games including "Hold his Hand" and "Help Cupid"...
  • Follow the advice of the "Love Coach" and make everyone fall for you in the game... and maybe also in real life!
CHAT WITH YOUR FRIENDS AND ADMIRERS using "Love Messenger" with the Nintendo DS Wireless Communications!
